title: Rishi Sunak – 2021 Comments on the Super Deduction Tax Allowance
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Rishi Sunak, the Chancellor of the Exchequer, on 31 March 2021.
content:
The super-deduction is the biggest two-year business tax cut in modern British history – driving our economy by helping businesses to invest, grow and support our Plan for Jobs.
